Instance Method Details

# (GoogieSpell) SpellChecker(input, options)

Create Spellchecker object for an Input This decorates a TextArea with a link to check spell

Parameters:

  • input ( String ) — the id of the html input tag
  • options ( Object )

Options Hash: (options):

  • server_url ( String ) — the url of spell endpoint

Returns:

  • ( GoogieSpell ) — object

# (Object) secondsToHHMMSS(seconds)

Convert seconds to an Object with hh, mm and ss.

Examples:

object = App.Utils.secondsToHHMMSS(3650)
console.log object.hh # => "01"
console.log object.mm # => "00"
console.log object.ss # => "50"

Parameters:

  • seconsd ( Double )

Options Hash: (hash):

  • hh ( String ) — hours in 00 format.
  • mm ( String ) — minutes in 00 format.
  • ss ( String ) — seconds in 00 format.

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — hash

# (String) minutesToHHMM(minutes)

Convert minutes to String

Parameters:

  • minutes ( Double )

Returns:

  • ( String ) — string with format "HH:MM"

# (String) minutesToFormat(minutes, format)

Convert minutes to Format

Parameters:

  • minutes ( Double )
  • format ( String ) — ex: "Hh Mm"

Returns:

  • ( String ) — string with format "5h 10m"

  • force ( Boolean ) — show help. Default: False
